description: Return the anomaly score of each sample using the IsolationForest algorithm

param.name: n_estimators
param.description: The number of base estimators in the ensemble.

param.name: bootstrap
param.description: If True, individual trees are fit on random subsets of the training data sampled with replacement. If False, sampling without replacement is performed.

param.name: warm_start
param.description: When set to True, reuse the solution of the previous call to fit and add more estimators to the ensemble, otherwise, just fit a whole new forest.
